sources.title: Title: Ghalandar (1972) trailer
sources.description: Title: Ghalandar (1972) Directed by: Ali Hatami Date of birth: 19 August 1944, Tehran, Iran Date of death: 7 December 1996 Tehran, Iran Writing credits: Ali Hatami Music: Morteza Hannaneh Year: 1972 Country: Iran Language: Farsi Color: Black and White Runtime: 100 min.
